video_prompt: Angelic figures gracefully fly through a sky with subtly shifting stardust. Cloud-piercing spires rise. Luminous structures expand infinitely, adorned with blossoming flora. A grand staircase ascends into distant light, creating a journey's impression.
image_prompt: A breathtaking, fantastical "heavenly city" with ethereal white and golden architecture, soaring spired castles, and classical columns adorned with soft pink, white, and purple floral arrangements. Angelic figures with white wings fly amidst a clear blue sky with fluffy clouds and subtle stardust. A grand, luminous white staircase ascends into the distance, surrounded by endless magnificent structures veiled in light, evoking peace, grandeur, and divine beauty.
refined_video_prompt: Angelic figures gracefully drift and weave through the sky as stardust subtly shifts and glimmers around them. Cloud-piercing spires dynamically emerge, continuously ascending into view. Luminous structures expand and transform, with flora actively blossoming across their surfaces. A grand staircase extends perpetually upwards, drawing the perspective towards a progressively brightening distant light.
